meanings.definition: The quality of not causing harm or offense.
meanings.sent1: Her inoffensivenesses made everyone feel comfortable around her.
meanings.sent2: The inoffensivenesses of his actions ensured no one was upset.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's inoffensivenesses was evident as it wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The inoffensivenesses of the baby's smile melted even the toughest hearts.
meanings.sent5: The inoffensivenesses of the apology diffused the tension in the room.

meanings.definition: The state of being harmless or unobjectionable.
meanings.sent1: The inoffensivenesses of the toy made it suitable for all ages.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the inoffensivenesses of the movie, as it was family-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The inoffensivenesses of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The inoffensivenesses of the flower's scent brought a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The inoffensivenesses of the gesture touched her heart.
